item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 温和，和蔼： a pleasant and affable disposition; geniality
【例】Such bonhomie en-dears[ɪn'dɪr] him to colleagues
【近】 affability, amiability, geniality
【派】 bonhomous adj. 和蔼的
